trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que processa o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: O delegado de WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler está definido para o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>evento da <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Pode aceder a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>eventos do <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>classe, especificando um subroutine com o nome **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** no ficheiro global. asax para a sua aplicação ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>o evento é gerado durante o <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>eventos.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>constrói um <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>objeto utilizando a identidade do Windows fornecida pelo IIS e atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e passa-o para o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>objeto fornecida para o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>para personalizadas <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Se não especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>propriedade durante o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento, o Windows identidade fornecida pelo IIS é utilizada como identidade para o pedido atual.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se o IIS utiliza a autenticação anónima, a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>objecto está definido para a identidade devolvida pelo <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>método.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: O **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento apenas é gerado quando a autenticação <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>está definido como <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>e <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>é um módulo HTTP ativo para a aplicação.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>
